title: Hidden Creek Forever
description:
Ready to leave hch for good? #check Throwing my middle fingers up on my way out the doors? #check Making sure every bitch who deserves it pays? #check Finding out all the truth, even the ones I may not want? #triplecheck And here I thought I could finally get away from my past.But nope.It's like a f*cking revolving door.And to top it off, I'm at a funeral saying goodbye to someone I never thought I would have to say goodbye to.The lines of 'right' and 'fair' no longer exist.It's every guy, girl, and rotten whore for themselves in this town.And my plan is to make it out alive.And I hope it's with the right person holding my hand... 



***





WARNING: Hidden Creek High (#hch) is a young adult / new adult series filled with everything you've been asking for in a series that's wild, hot, fun, and crazy... it's recommended for mature readers because of cursing and 'certain scenes' ;) 


In other words, if that sh*t bothers, stay away. But seriously... you're already here, don't stay away. START READING NOW.
author: Jaxson Kidman
